solution_line_template: This means that Fiona was cleaning for {total_cleaning_hours} hours total cleaning - {lilly_cleaning_hours} hours Lilly's cleaning = <<{total_cleaning_hours}-{lilly_cleaning_hours}={fiona_cleaning_hours}>>{fiona_cleaning_hours} hours.

So in minutes, Fiona was cleaning for {fiona_cleaning_hours} hours * {minutes_per_hour} minutes in an hour = <<{fiona_cleaning_hours}*{minutes_per_hour}={fiona_cleaning_minutes}>>{fiona_cleaning_minutes} minutes.
